Uses of Package
org.apache.twill.api.security

  • Packages that use org.apache.twill.api.security 
    Package Description
    org.apache.twill.api
    Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Twill library.
    org.apache.twill.api.security  
    org.apache.twill.yarn
    Classes in this package implement the Twill API for Apache Hadoop YARN.
  • Classes in org.apache.twill.api.security used by org.apache.twill.api 
    Class and Description
    SecureStoreRenewer
    This class is responsible for renewing the secure store used by application.
  • Classes in org.apache.twill.api.security used by org.apache.twill.api.security 
    Class and Description
    SecureStoreWriter
    A writer provided to SecureStoreRenewer for writing out SecureStore during renewal process.
  • Classes in org.apache.twill.api.security used by org.apache.twill.yarn 
    Class and Description
    SecureStoreRenewer
    This class is responsible for renewing the secure store used by application.
